tuple data = read_column_data('c16pc371e.spc')
 
list fields = data[:,0]
 
list experimental = data[:,1]
 
list fit = data[:,2]
 
tuple integral_of_spectrum = cumsum(experimental)
 
tuple normalization = abs(sum(integral_of_spectrum))
 
tuple fig = figure(figsize = (9,6))
 
list components = data[:,3:]
 
tuple max_of_fit = max(fit)
 
tuple ax = gca()
 
tuple ylims = ax.get_ylim()

tuple rms = mean((fit/normalization-experimental/normalization)**2)

 transform = ax.transAxes)
